arn.description: The ARN of the DHCP Options Set.

netbiosNodeType.description: The NetBIOS node type (1, 2, 4, or 8). AWS recommends to specify 2 since broadcast and multicast are not supported in their network. For more information about these node types, see [RFC 2132](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2132.txt).

ownerId.description: The ID of the AWS account that owns the DHCP options set.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource.
